cells.data:
-- If the list is empty returns Nothing, otherwise returns 
-- Just the init and the last.

-- unsnoc :: [a] -> Maybe ([a], a)on unsnoc(xs)	set blnString to class of xs is string	set lng to length of xs	if lng = 0 then		Nothing()	else		set h to item -1 of xs		if lng > 1 then			if blnString then				Just(Tuple(text 1 thru -2 of xs, h))			else				Just(Tuple(items 1 thru -2 of xs, h))			end if		else			if blnString then				Just(Tuple("", h))			else				Just(Tuple({}, h))			end if		end if	end ifend unsnoc
